```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Initialization


```{r package}
require(tidyverse) 
require(datasauRus)
require(ggplot2)
```

## View Dataframe

```{r view, echo=FALSE}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  count(dataset)
```

## Plot

```{r plot, ehco=FALSE}
dino_data <- datasaurus_dozen %>%
  filter(dataset == "dino")
ggplot(data = dino_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r plot_all, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, color = dataset))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~ dataset, ncol = 3) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```


## Aggregation correlations

```{r aggregate, ehco=FALSE}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(r = cor(x, y))
```
